## Offline Map and road navigation data  (Daily updates) ##
Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone. OpenStreetMap Ebola Response

* Android Systems : Install [OSMAnd Android Application](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.osmand&hl=fr) for Road Navigation with Voice guidance.
* GPS Garmin Map

[More information ](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/2014_West_Africa_Ebola_Response#Offline_Navigation_on_Small_Devices)
